title: Mouse adjust to a certain speed every time I enter a game
body:
My mouse speed goes up every single time I start a new League of Legends game. It only does this with League (also the PBE). I have a Logitech gaming mouse, and I am not quite sure how to fix this. My Windows mouse speed is the only speed that changes whenever I enter a game, not my actual mouse dpi or League of Legends mouse speed. Any help/info on this is appreciated!

My mouse is a Logitech G700s if that is needed

replies.body:
Your in-game mouse settings are exclusive to the game, and won't be the same outside of that.  If your settings are changing each time you load up a game, then your config settings could be acting up.  In that case, a config reset should do the trick.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
